Review.Contenu: Same situation as Justin. A management change at Alto has instituted a much different fee schedule from the one I have had for a period of years, which caused me to use Alto. Now, it includes $400 per year in fees PLUS fees for miscellaneous things like transfers and any account closing.

Had a multi-year real estate deal that I wanted to do and signed up with Alto for their premium plan for my IRA. Yearly fees was $250. Four months into the deal, I get an email stating now their fees are $400 a year. What a bunch of crooks.

Terrible platform and software.  Very little investment performance visibility and no process for simply putting in a short limit sale.  I list significant fees because of this and there was no indicator that their software sells immediately when a short limit order is entered.  Management refuses to refund any of the fees.  Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Alto Refuses to allow rollover to another institution
Review.Contenu: Similar to others, I am unable to rollover my Roth account from Alto to another institution. I receive timely email replies with reasons they need us to pay to move our money or things are not yet complete. I recommend you avoid working with Alto. I have worked with a dozen investment firms and this is only firm that has had suspect business practices like this.

Trying to log in to my account for over 3 weeks, password reset link does not work.  Have called customer service and have been placed on hold for extremely long wait times, only to get a prompt to leave a message.  Left several messages with no response.
I transferred my initial investment from my bank account via Plaid interface and now it no longer works.  I can’t seem to get your IT department to figure out why it no longer works.

Horrific customer service.  Expect transfers to take months, cost $$,  and require dozens of follow-ups (during business hours, because the web site can't do anything).  Have a lawyer handy.   Multiple security incidents.  Oh, and a fee to close you account.

AVIOD AT ALL COST.  This company is a scam.  I invested for about two weeks, they waited till I made a couple transfers, and then one day I was told my log in email was invalid.  I reached out to customer service and received a reply that said"we have no record of your account". I filed a fraud claim with my back, so luckily I was able retrieve my funds bank.  Disregard Alto's response, they have not reached out to me!

I ended up being an Alto customer when LendingClub pushed the partnership on its customers. When I wanted to transfer the assets to another Roth IRA custodian and close the account, Alto would not process the request before I paid a $50 account closure fee. When I politely asked them to waive it, the reply I got was along the lines of "You agreed to our terms and conditions when you opened your account, if you want us to process the transfer, pay up." I'd suggest going with another, more reputable company.

Review.Titre: Roth conversion taking over a month, can't access funds
Review.Contenu: Upon attempting a Roth conversion, the company has kept my funds locked up for over a month without processing it. I can neither cancel the request nor move the money.

Review.Titre: Very inept customer service.  Possible fraud!
Review.Contenu: I had an unauthorized transfer of USD from my Altoira crypto account.  For 3 weeks I havent gotten an answer as to what it was.  I am constantly told that a team will contact me.  The people I talk to cannot even answer a question.  Now my account when logging on says invalid email address.  Its always been the same email and I have no idea if I still have an account.  Again... a team will contact me.  It hasnt happened yet!  Customer service has been extremely slow and terrible.

Review.Titre: We have been trying to roll our cash…
Review.Contenu: We have been trying to roll our cash only ira to another administrator from November 2022 until this date of 3-31-23 and Alto refuses to complete the transaction. Numerous emails and calls from my administrator and myself were refused. The transaction finally entered their system in 2-16.  4-2 update: Alto is now claiming that the paperwork was rejected because payment details were not sent. I am told that payment details are always sent with transfer paperwork and a phone call to them on 3-31 by my administrator was not answered. Our next step is to file a complaint with FINRA to get this resolved.4-4-23 update. The transfer has been completed. I can't say if it was because of this review or not, but the timing is very suspicious.

Review.Titre: Customer service are is friendly, but transfers are fairly torturous
Review.Contenu: I am increasingly disappointed in Alto IRA, although I still have hope that they can improve. Most of their problems seem be be due to flaws in their infrastructure, particularly in transfers into and out of Alto. I also never got a call back from any of their investment "partners"- which makes me wonder. Although they do have some friendly people in their customer support, the  accounting on their is cause for concern. I still have a small amount of remaining money in their accounts which I am trying to transfer from Lending Club to them, and then to a very large brokerage. It should have be seamless and simple, but instead the process has taken 3-4 weeks thus far -this time around. The customer service hotline is a fairly torturous phone queue. (the jazzy 4 measure one handed piano player jingle will drive you insane), but if you know the backdoor phone number and email  you may do better. .
Beware, they charge a fee to close your account, got stuck with them through Lending Club and they hold your funds until you pay. Slimy business practice.

I was an alto IRA customer for years. Super high fees for everything. Nearly impossible to reach on the phone. Absolutely no way to contact them at nights or weekends. Also no way to contact them electronically.  customer service reps very poorly trained, have absolutely no idea what they’re talking about.  I can’t remember a single transaction that I did with alto IRA that did not have to be redone at least two more times. Alto notorious for asking you to fill out forms, and then turn around two days later and tell you that those were the wrong forms.And transfers in or out?? Don’t get me started. Any transfer out of alto was stalled, delayed or stopped altogether, unless you called every day… Literally every day hammering on them to complete the transaction.  Deposits, routinely lost.  transfers out… routinely went into the ether.  Over all the years I was a customer with them auto was never able to complete a single wire transfer successfully the first time in fact, they were never able to complete a wire transfer in Two tries.  Alto, in every case… And I mean in every case… Required three tries to complete any wire transfer in or out.I can’t tell you how strongly I recommend against using Alto. avoid this company at all costs.

Review.Titre: Can't be trusted with your assets!
Review.Contenu: Sent our dividends/distributions to someone else's account.  Sent other investor's dividends/distributions to our account.  Lost dividends/distributions that our investment companies have proven/documented they issued.  Labeled distributions incorrectly (indicating they were from one investment, when they were from another).  Monthly statements are erroneous, including the above, and also that we requested that they withhold taxes on a distribution from the account to us, and they didn't but the monthly statement showed they did.  Never took responsibility for all of the above....only indicated that our investment companies have issues.  Froze our access to our cash for 3 months now, because they can't reconcile our account.

These people are bandits! First they charge $25 to get your money electronically or wait three weeks to get a check. Then there is the outrageous $100/yr account fee, and worst of all, a $50 fee to close my account. What a crock of you know what!!

Review.Titre: NO customer service response to my emails and phone calls in over 2 months
Review.Contenu: I have been trying to get in touch with them for the last 2 months. No response from anyone by phone or email and I have tried both weekly. Still no response. Are they still in business or did they get caught up in the FTX crypto debacle? I see they monitor these comments. I will let everyone know if I do not hear from them soon. For now .. I would be hesitant to deal with this company.  If you doubt me .. try calling them 877-673-1557 and see what you get. Hope they prove me wrong because they have a nice little chunk of my money that I am trying to get from them.

Review.Titre: Transaction was sent out as and ACH…
Review.Contenu: Transaction was sent out as and ACH rather than the Wire I requested.  I missed out on the investment.
Your technology doesn't work as expected, resulting in erroneously executed trades. No bueno

Review.Titre: Your website leaves much to be desired…
Review.Contenu: Your website leaves much to be desired - there should be instructions where distributions from investments get sent to Alto for deposit into our accounts.  You should be able to open multiple types of accounts with the same email (Roth, traditional IRA, SEP IRA, solo 401K, etc.)  I cannot recommend your service to others.

Review.Titre: I am somewhat disappointed in alto
Review.Contenu: I am somewhat disappointed in alto. The platform is not that intuitive. And I was told that I could open a regular Ira and move funds from my crypto Ira into that. But when I asked to do that they said I need to have another email. I do not want to have two emails. So I was missed informed when I asked about it originally. Now I’m looking for another custodian that I can open up a regular Ira at.

Review.Titre: Part 3 if Take your business somewhere…
Review.Contenu: Part 3 if Take your business somewhere else.November 30, 2021 - after submitting another TOA(Transfer of Assett) form with my brokerage firm (due to the untimely handling by ALTO of my first request) , the TOA was sent to ALTO.Again, I really don’t know how Breanna holds the title of Manager of Client Experience. One might think that would be a positive title, but, my experience was nothing but negative.

I'm annoyed that 1) there's no ability to setup an automatic monthly deposit from my bank, 2) it took so many days to complete an ACH transfer from my bank to Alto and then to Coinbase and then to be ready to trade, and 3) I didn't know up-front they were going to take 1.5% of my crypto deposit.

Review.Titre: Awful ! open to complete account  in AltoIRA
Review.Contenu: This is very awful to open an account and transfer 401K to Traditional IRA and open Alto Roth IRA and transfer Traditional IRA to Roth IRA. It took almost a month to complete the process, this is one of the most stupid things in my life. I'm super regrading for choosing this platform. Customer service '0' star, Information in website '0' star, have no smoothness in the workflow. And they don't have service on Saturday!

Review.Titre: 4 attempts to invest in Linqto failed
Review.Contenu: 4 attempts to invest in Linqto failed.  Still have not been able to complete an investment from my Roth IRA into Linqto from Alto.  Linqto closes the transaction because funds are not received in time for settlement.  Ugh.

Review.Titre: Since Alto became the IRA custodian for…
Review.Contenu: Since Alto became the IRA custodian for Lending Club, it has been a disaster. First they were hacked and all accounts were frozen. I don't hold that against them. But since then it takes days from the time I transfer money out of Lending Club before it shows up in my AltoIRA account. And it takes weeks to get money transferred out of Alto to other institutions. They have repeatedly lied to me about the money being sent when it was not. This whole experience has been terrible.

Switched to Alto as a Lendingclub investor like many others. I'll excuse the 2 plus week shutdown due to the cyber attack, but their customer service before and after the attack does not deserve the 1 star I gave the review. I'll save you the many grueling details of my terrible customer service experiences and their lackadaisical responses. I'm seriously thinking of going back to my former custodian. DO NOT use Alto as your custodian!!!

Review.Titre: Could someone answer the important emails?
Review.Contenu: I have been requesting information about the status of a transfer of funds out of AltoIRA since 9/3/21 today is 9/10/21. I have not received the information requested. I don't understand why AltoIRA is not answering my emails regarding the status. Could someone please let me know what the status is? This is important.

Their process for handling IRA distributions is in serious disarray. Distribution requests can't be submitted on-line, calls to customer support bounce to voicemail, and emails go unanswered. Judging from some of the other reviews here I'm not the only one running into these problems.

I needed to recharacterize my IRA to a ROTH IRA and had to reach out to them multiple times via phone. It has been more than a week and they still have not addressed my issue. This operation would is automated with most actual brokers such as Vanguard and etc. It is not justifiable that this requires multiple manual interventions.

Wish I could post screenshots here. I had filed for a disbursement on 12/21/21. 9 days later Alto told me that I had entered the wrong info. I cancelled my pending withdraw, and tried again. Only to find out that I was unable to enter my info. I asked 2 DAYS ago for help. Till now no response via email, or on the chat. Alto fees you for each deposit, withdraw, and maintenance fees. Best to use a trading platform.UPDATE: I just talked with Kevin and helped me to file for my withdraw. I will keep you posted as to when I get paid. UPDATE: 1/7/22 Just received my funds in full.

Review.Titre: I just got off the phone with one of…
Review.Contenu: I just got off the phone with one of your reps. This rep had an absolute abysmal attitude. There was. no, I repeat, not 1 apology from this person. The candor regarding a financial situation was beyond my understanding. It’s sad when a company is saddled with careless employees early on.

Review.Titre: Alto will take your hard earned money!
Review.Contenu: I am a former Financial Advisor and Alto charges 1% a year of the total account value of the IRA. That is a complete and total ripoff. They are not performing anything to earn this 1%....IT'S A SELF-DIRECTED IRA!! Financial Advisors across the country charge 1% to manage your investment account. Alto should be ashamed of themselves to charge this fee. Do yourself a favor and find other alternatives. They do exist, without the 1% annual charge.

Review.Titre: I came to AltoIRA via Lending Club
Review.Contenu: I came to AltoIRA via Lending Club.  They switched my custodial account from Forge Trust to Alto earlier this year.  Unfortunately I did not realize this until after I made a withdrawal from Lending club.  I hae been attempting to activate my AltoIRA account in order to access the funds transferred to them from lending club sin July 8th and as of yet there website is still not working.  I sent several emails and even talked to them on the phone.  They keep saying it will be up in few days but now it has been nearly 3 weeks and I still hae no access tomy money.

Review.Titre: Worst place ever they don't even have a…
Review.Contenu: Worst place ever they don't even have a phone number to contact them if there's a problem everything has to be done by email and you got to wait like a week to get a response I'm withdrawing my money and now they're giving me a hard time avoid this place like the plague

Review.Titre: It has been 4 weeks since my IRA distribution request with Alto IRA with no result
Review.Contenu: I find the customer service at AltoIra horrific. I was switched to AltoIra without my knowledge by Lending Club, and now it has been 4 weeks since I requested my IRA distribution, and when I open my AltoIra account it still shows "pending initiation". Also there is no phone number anywhere on AltoIra site  and all communications are by email only. I do receive emails from different people at AltoIra saying that my distribution request will be addressed but no result whatsoever in 4 weeks !!! This is simply unacceptable. I wish I knew which regulatory agency I could file a complaint with.

Difficult to add funds, very little customer support wnd not user friendly.  Other friends have the same issue with your firm.  As a result not sure throng term viability of this firm.  Currently not adding funds due to no support

Review.Titre: Good review and this is exactly what is…
Review.Contenu: Good review and this is exactly what is wrong with this company. Suggestion; Invest into some people to answer your phone and get the money transfers done quicker. Or stop advertising when you can't even answer the phone! Over promise and under deliver! I get a better customer service from the IRS!Other reviewer post: Alto and Capitalize seem to be still working customer services out. I have been unable to reach anyone by phone or email and get a quick answer during business hours. Emails responses seem to be sent at the end of the day and are already behind by the time I hear back. It is very frustrating. Now that all the funds are in my account trading is relatively easy.

Review.Titre: Not what I was expecting for an SDIRA…
Review.Contenu: We've been extremely disappointed thus far.  It was easy enough to open an account and move cash, but it's been over a quarter now trying to get the assets from my other SDIRA to transfer with multiple attempts thus far.

Disgusting service. Scammer. The support service does not respond, they block the account without explaining the reasons. They do not allow to withdraw money. I strongly do not recommend using this service.

DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY!!!! Do your research… there are more competent Crypto IRA companies out there with professionalism, morals and business sense than ALTO! To start, ALTO took double the amount that I authorized out of my personal bank account in January 2022. Fast forward to April 2022 and I am still trying to get my money back. I will not put money into a crypto IRA with a company who has deceitful business practices, shotty back room operations and non-existent customer service. I have now retained an attorney and will be taking ALTO to court. I have done absolutely everything I was told to do and they still will not return the excess funds that were taken from me. Please save yourself the time, frustration and sanity and DO BUSINESS ELSEWHERE!!!!

Account opening was straightforward.  Transferring money to the crypto IRA.  The money left my broker two days ago and has yet to show in my account.  So far I have left 3 emails, Monday, Tuesday and today WITHOUT a response.  Poor start to the relationship

Like many others, I was pretty much forced to move my Lending Club funds from another custodian to Alto. That was almost two months ago, but I've yet to see a penny actually transferred. Some of the money is still at Lending Club, some has disappeared into cyberspace. Also, Lending Club promised that Alto's first year's administrative fee would be waived. But when I signed up on Alto they demanded a credit card before opening my account and charged me $100. A customer service rep promised me the $100 would refunded; it has not been. They have no phone number to call, sometimes they answer emails and sometimes not. Don't deal with Alto!

I have requested and pretty much begged ALTO to not send me any emails or contact me  because of the bad experiences I had with them before I could make the fatal mistake of using them as a custodian. They finally said they would remove my information and comply with my request.Yesterday I received an email asking me for referrals. I would not refer this company to my worst enemy.Once you contact this company by email, which is pretty much the only way to get in touch with them, they keep your info in their data base and constantly email you. They are unstoppable in sending junk emails and I am tired of it.Stay away from this company! Do not contact them...ever!
Money Transfers take 1 week and Bad customer service!! The website on my account has conflicting information where my money is but NOT IN MY ACCOUNT!!!!  This is a very unrefined Investment site!

Review.Titre: It’s too hard to execute trades with…
Review.Contenu: It’s too hard to execute trades with you folks Trades should happen in about 30 seconds or less maybe a minuteAnd since you’re charging 1.5% I think you should be doing it promptly

Review.Titre: Stay Away from AltoIRA - the worst!
Review.Contenu: I wanted to open a Self Directed IRA to invest in alternative assets. I opened an account, which was a fairly easy and intuitive process. However, after opening up an account, everything that could go wrong went wrong. Poor communication, terrible customer service with long response times, multiple bank withdrawal requests, no visibility into funding, etc. Additionally, AltoIRA just had a huge data/privacy breach. Therefore, I would recommend staying away from these tech-enabled IRA providers like AltoIRA, Rocket Dollar, etc. Go with the traditional non-tech enabled companies like Broad Financial, Entrust, etc. Less data/privacy risk, more customer service, and attention, and a better experience overall. It's worth the marginal premium in the long run!

Review.Titre: Yikes! $250k in assets and no support for issues!
Review.Contenu: Like many others here, I was coerced to Alto via Lending Club. I have two Lending Club accounts and both have encountered issues with [lack of] fund transfers, horrific (meaning no) customer service, no means to speak to an actual human to resolve issues, etc. I've submitted several Alto help requests/emails over the past couple months and receive dismissive or deflective responses weeks later with nobody willing to engage and actually help resolve the issues. I waited as long as I could for them to get things in order with the Lending Club transfers and their recent network breach, but I can't waiting any longer. Isn't this an IRA custodian/administrator with obligations to clients and federal regulators? I'm packing my toys and finding another IRA custodian ASAP.
For weeks now, my pods have either all leaked out or have been bought burnt, I open the package and it’s a brown yellow color. This is unprofessional and quite unsafe as well.

Review.Titre: I intended on investing my money and am…
Review.Contenu: I intended on investing my money and am missing an opportunity to get in at a low due to your 7 day rule. It’s my money. I should be able to do what I want with it.
The Website does not work, not responsive to emails, no phone number, they have my money and I can't access it.  Stay away, I now have to fight to get my money back.

Review.Titre: There is no way to speak to anyone when…
Review.Contenu: There is no way to speak to anyone when you have a problem understanding something.  Need to have better contact information that includes the ability to speak with someone if necessary.
This system sucks. It advertises that it you can buy crypto but, even though there's a pull-down menu for a bunch of crypto, you can only buy bitcoin

I've had issues with them, though I like the idea of what they are trying to do. Unfortunately their web site was hacked back in July  2021, and they were offline for about two weeks. Since then I've been trying to transfer money out of there back to a previous IRA custodian with very little success.  I have had to file a complaint with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau because of a 2+ month delay, and possible lost checks.  See: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau Complaint Number 211019-7461102  My biggest complaint is that transfering money into and out of Alto IRA was never smooth, involved countless hours of calling various parties and leaving emails. They always respond with a generic email saying they are listening, but the responses and customer service are minimal and insincere.  Obviously they are a young company with lots of growing up to do. I wont be keeping my money there for much longer.

Review.Titre: The customer experience has been awful
Review.Contenu: The customer experience has been awful. Lost check, late deposit, and difficulty getting to speak with or even get an email back from staff.

Unfortunately, my experience with transferring my account from its current custodian was riddled with errors on Alto's part.  The electronically-generated transfer form was sent to the wrong address, no solution was provided for fixing the problem, inaccurate timing projections were provided, I was charged incorrect amounts of fees, I was guided about the wrong day to invest in a fund, having needed to overnight a check for a workaround solution, Alto only located the overnighted check four days after it arrived at their company, and a litany of other minor details were missed.  At the end, once my issues became escalated, everything worked out with my investment; however, I invested many hours of personal time in assuring that this process was done correctly and did not have confidence that Alto did their part of the job.  The supervisory manager did give me assurance that things would be handled well going forward, however, this volume of errors is difficult to overcome as far as my confidence in the company's professional execution is concerned.
Your transfer process is too cumbersome!  You should have a customer service number with a real person to talk to.

AltoIRA.com’s concept is awesome: A tax sheltered way to invest in Cryptocurrency and other forms of unique investments. The problem with this website is that it’s simply not ready for launch. The website is RIDDEN with bugs that make it operationally awful. It is nearly impossible to contact customer service for any specific problem you’re having because there just isn’t enough employees on their payroll to satisfy their customer base. And lastly, the transferring of funds in and out of their website from other custodians will give you an absolute heart attack. I was with this company for only 7 days before I quickly realized I wanted nothing to do with them, and when I tried to send my money back to the original brokerage firm I was met with obstacles each step of the way. The worst part is, each step it takes customer service to respond to you in 3 days. Right now, it’s been two weeks and my money is still rotting in the account and I am getting no support! Trust me when I tell you all to please stay away… You do NOT want to trust your money with these people at this moment in time. I hope this changes because their concept is fantastic.
Takes me 2 weeks to invest?  Sorry no thanks I will move on to other companies that's freaking crazy.

Review.Titre: No response back regarding question I called about
Review.Contenu: Agent never got back to me regarding maximum contribution for 2021 for a  self-employed contractor.

Review.Titre: Go somewhere else with your business…
Review.Contenu: Go somewhere else with your business Part 2For clarification in my first review. I started the transfer process in June 2021 and was finally completed at ALTO in November 2021.ALTO was closed for two weeks for COVID at the end of October and beginning of November 2021. If you read my first review, it may have sounded like the  two week shutdown occurred earlier. Once again, I was never notified of the closure and left without any communication.ALTO, you responded to my Part 1 one star review  with: “…. We understand that there is definitely an urgency when it comes to exercising warrants and transferring shares to another custodian.”My response: My paperwork with my custodian to where the shares were being transferred into, from ALTO expired after 90 days. Since this process took nearly five months, I will have to refile another TOA(Transfer of Assett) form. Right, doesn’t sound like a big deal and if it were the only delay or  miscommunication from ALTO, it wouldn’t be a big deal. However, stack it on top of everything I’ve already mentioned, it’s just another area where ALTO created more work and frustration for me where if things were handled in a timely manner, I wouldn’t be here giving ALTO another one star review.James
Pretty damned confusingTried to buy $50 of bitcoin and you wouldn't accept my signature.

Alto has the worst customer service I have ever experienced with any company. Total frustration! Not transparent as they show no contact phone number. They want you to email them and have to wait days until they decide to call back. If you miss their call, the process starts all over again. Even when you leave a VM or email addressed to a particular person someone else contacts you back.I made the HUGE mistake of filling out a partial application online and quit because I could not get Conner to call me back regarding a question I had. I have emailed and spoke to Tom, Conner and Robert saying I wanted nothing to do with this company and wanted to be taken off their contact list and my info erased. Then I was emailed that their website was hacked and I needed to reset my password! I am furious they did not remove my personal info...SS#, birthdate, name, address, etc. After about a dozen emails and 2 phone calls they refused to issue me free credit monitoring for 1 year. Please do not even talk to ALTO as you are wasting your time and setting yourself up for major problems. If their customer service is this poor before they get your money, I cannot imagine how bad it would be after they get your account and money. There are better people to deal with. Alto is the worst!

I came to Alto via LendingClub. Earlier this year, LendingClub changed their 'preferred' custodian from Forge to Alto. I had the opportunity to choose my own custodian or do nothing and automatically move to Alto. My experience has not been good since. I decided to move from LC to Prosper for note investing, so I transferred some available funds into Alto. The transfer wasn't happening, but after contacting LC, they straightened out the problem and my funds showed up in my Alto account as cash balance. Then the real fun began...I initiated a custodian to custodian transfer from Alto to Millennium with both Alto and Millennium. Millennium made the transfer request to Alto over two weeks ago, and that's the last either I or Millennium have heard from Alto. Missing in action. They have not responded to communications from anyone. Alto still shows my transfer as 'pending initiation' and there it sits, even though Millennium initiated it over two weeks ago. So I'm left with my funds lost to Alto and no communication from them. The other companies have been very responsive and helpful, but Alto just outright sucks...not a nice thing I can say about them. So beware of dealing with Alto. I have a hard time believing the good reviews here are for real.
WOw, incredibly slow transfer service and holds.  Buy direct crypto, it is instant.

Review.Titre: Good at making promises but not at following through
Review.Contenu: I have had an account with Alto IRA since March of 2020.  At the time I was putting money in, customer service was good.  There were a number of glitches in getting the account set up and the money in, but they were a new company, and they communicated well enough throughout the process, so that wasn't a big deal.  What has been has been the literally abysmal customer service since then.  It seems like as soon as they have your money they put no effort into timely customer service, and they take no responsibility for issues on their side.  I missed the chance for one investment (a partner firm) because the process did not work and I couldn't get timely support.  They've also raised fees since I signed up and yet conveniently didn't respond to any of my inquiries for the month leading up to the change so I couldn't make the investment I wanted before the change (which would make the same investment much more expensive).  I don't expect a new company to be perfect, but I do expect them to try to take care of their customers, and to make reasonable accommodations to their customers when failures on their side do occur.  To me this has seemed more like a money grab, where they get you in the door to make their numbers look good but then put no effort into providing anything close to the service that was promised.  To sum up, I've been paying for the service for almost 2 years and have not been able to make one investment.  Not one.
At what time do the miscues, requests, endless emails finally end?
Fees are high.   Trades do not happen quickly.

Review.Titre: Go somewhere else with your business.
Review.Contenu: First of all:  To ALTO - PLEASE do not give me any more excuses and apologies for NOT doing your job. Please, no more “I’m sorry, but…”One star is generous review rating.I needed an account that needed to be transferred out of ALTO into my brokerage account. My paperwork with my brokerage was filed June 21, 2021. As of November 18, 2021 it was finally complete. As of today, November 19, 2021 after speaking with my brokerage account, since it’s been past 90 days I have to resubmit another Transfer of Assett form due to the other paperwork expiring . They also told me, that three attempts of communication was made after my initial TOA form was filed June 22, 2021. They received no response from Alto, and after my communication with them in July they had to mail a request via USPS to Alto.  Yes, their office was vacated due to Covid for two weeks - no one told me about the reason for that delay, until after asking. Yes, my stock shares needed to to cleared via a third party. I got timely emails and updates from that third party, waited patiently, expecting to get an Alto update, never got an update, so just like several times before, I initiated more communication to Alto requesting an update. I sent back requested paperwork within 3 days, the third party was timely with what they were required to file. ALTO was the log jam in the river.As a customer, why is it my responsibly to constantly initiate communication only get numerous “I’m sorry, but…” I felt like I was doing Breanna Pepper’s job , who happens to be a manager of “customer experience”.I received wrong information, excuses, untimely updates and felt like I was doing her job with follow-up communication with my brokerage account, ALTO customer service , another manager within Alto(Sean), and finally Breanna who was never without an “I’m sorry, but…”My advice : Go somewhere else with your business.James M.

Unable to speak with someone as a problem arises...Told to schedule a call....in 10 daysThen they fail to send my funds by wire transfer as instructed....even though they charge for it....they used ACH instead, without informing me....after that I hear from no less than a half dozen different people...nobody takes responsibility...nobody knows where the money...$100,000... is or why it was not wired....they keep saying the investment is " complete" even though the funds have never been received. In the end they waste an entire week before they realize they even screwed up the ACH....the money was returned to them...so they finally used Wire Transfer and of course it arrives at the company within hours....as it should have in the first place a week prior.Overall they have layers of employees all with various job titles and nobody seems to know what the others are doing. You get lots of apologies but no action. For a time-sensitive investment scenario this is a disaster. They require the recipient of the investment to " join" their site as a " sponsor" and you are not copied or apprised of what is going on until after it's happening. They request information from the sponsor instead of from them through you...it's your money...your investment, but you are not in the loop....then ....surprise! After asking for wire instructions....they don't wire the money...you find this out from the sponsor instead of Alto that it wasn't sent.... fortunately the company was very understanding and spent a lot of their own time trying to get Alto to perform and kept me informed. Alto refunded the wire charge, in some small effort to compensate for a week of unecessary agrivation and delay...but true to form, they went and charged me for it anyway a couple days later..after saying they would not.... The circus continues...as soon as I updated this review...( end emailed them once again)  the wire charge was refunded....A completely dysfunctional organization has been my experience. It's as if there's a whole bunch of people on computers at home with no idea what the others are doing.

Review.Titre: Real New User Review: what you should know they don't tell you!
Review.Contenu: Real New User Review:First make sure you sign up for the correct type of account.  Thought I was signing up for coin trading SEP IRA instead I managed to sigh up for just a SEP IRA.  This was a bit confusing considering I knew exactly what type of account I was after.  Since my transfer was coming from Fidelity, the right of recision had expired. At least that was in my favor.  Pretty much nothing else was.I had called the day after I initiated my transfer and spoke to Paul Hayslip, he informed that I had signed up for the wrong type of account.  Not to worry, it could be fixed on the back end within the next few hours.  I checked later that day and still no change.  I sent him an email with zero response.  I called, zero response, online help, zero response, so I let it go for the day.  The following day I checked back. Zero response, there was not a soul to be found! It took about a week before Paul responded (nobody else responded period to any of so called help or chat lines).  He claimed that there was an email sent out.  I can't imagine for the life of me why they could have a message displayed after logging in with this disclaimer.  I get it, they're a start up but when you're dealing with peoples money, accessibility is the key to success.  Plus being new, most emails could be considered spam or junk.  I don't think they did, I never received any notification, checked both junk and spam folders. Finally the account is coded correctly, the transfer is complete, lets get some money invested...  Nope,  you have to transfer from your account to the trading account.  This doesn't happen when you push the buttons, who knows what has to happen.  More sit and wait. Finally after several hours, the transfer is complete.  Don't get too excited, trades have to process as well.  They take 5 plus minutes per trade.  No API interface at this time either.  All in all, its a very slow process with terrible communication response time and you might as well cancel any communication if its a holiday, not just for the day, for the week!The one positive Alto offers, decent coin options based on Coinbase. Good luck, hopefully thing get better or other companies understand the importance or solid communication.  1 Star at best.

Review.Titre: Annoying af to transfer money to

Review.Contenu: Too long to finalize deposit
Lost money.  My account is almost 2/3 less than I started.My bad choices

Review.Titre: frustrating account set up and funding
Review.Contenu: It took a lot time almost 3 months to set up my account and then to fund it and invest to meet  a capital call. The person assigned to me was helpful but they were not at all proactive. I had to keep pinging him about the status throughout the process and he would react only when I identified the problem. Overall very frustrating process and I would be very reluctant to recommend Alto to anyone and I investment account is over $5M across various firms.

Review.Titre: Alto’s crypto platform has a major flaw…
Review.Contenu: Alto’s crypto platform has a major flaw that they do not disclose anywhere on their website. Cryptocurrencies that you buy can only be sold as long as they remain listed on Coinbase. If they are delisted from Coinbase, which can happen to any coin at any time, they cannot be sold and are essentially stranded assets because Alto does not have a means to sell cryptos outside of Coinbase. Alto does not currently have a solution to this and does not seem to consider it a major problem.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service and Web site design
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed with the lack of customer service and poor web design.  Phone call hold times were extremely long, resulting in the need to send emails.  It took days to get a response, which required additional follow up correspondence.  When I finally spoke with a person, she was helpful and professional. The web site is difficult to use and not clear.  The account balances listed didn't match each other. I had no faith in this company.  I closed and trnsferred my account as a result.

Review.Titre: Too more than 2 weeks and team is not…
Review.Contenu: Too more than 2 weeks and team is not responsive and responsible.
1. Too much time spent 2. Reactive way / method to deal with the request

Review.Titre: Seems Alto back end accounting is not…
Review.Contenu: Seems Alto back end accounting is not fully functional yet.  I have a Roth IRA custodied at Alto.  Alto's books show the account is 100% notes from Lending Club when in reality it is mostly cash and some notes.  I transferred the cash into the Alto Roth IRA so now my account shows an incorrect balance, still with 100% notes plus the cash I transferred.  This has been a couple weeks since I did this.  Someone needs to do a backend transaction to reconcile to the correct balance.

Terrible experience migrating over from Chase. The entire process was on me and no one made any effort to assist in the process. Everyone at Chase that I talked to kept mentioning how typically "the receiving party handles this and not the client" and with other rollovers in the past it's been the case as well. I'm glad I can use Coinbase custody and asset options, but the process and the eventual crappy Alto UI for trading is really not on par with modern fintech experiences.

It is absurd that I have to create a different IRA type with a different email, and also that you don’t demonstrate growth % next to each asset. The only reason I didn’t give a 1 is because Vivian is nice. I’m thinking about moving elsewhere though because what a ridiculously amateur experience.

Review.Titre: I am neutral because of these reasons:
Review.Contenu: Update today - altoira has been pretty much non functional today - December 28 - again when the market is tanking. Reducing my rating by 1 star.I am neutral because of these reasons:a. Very high fees . 1.5 percent is really too highb. I started trading in this account for the first time during that big flash crash on Dec 3rd/4th. I could not get the best prices. The trades also took a very long time to execute. c. No bots.d. no ability to provide stop loss. Only limit order for sells.

I wasn’t a fan of how convoluted their transfer process was. Initially I was directed to using their transfer method, then that failed due to my previous custodian, so next I was sent to use a horrible partner of theirs called “Capitalize” who was absolutely horrible and lied to me. Their transfer rep. was very responsive though. Their customer experience side seems pretty clueless about the nuances of crypto and are just there to navigate you surficially.     Not a big fan that Alto isn’t distributing me earnings from native wallet staking either. Nor that I have access to cold storage wallets to verify they’re actually holding my funds.

Review.Titre: Takes way too long to be able make trades!!!
Review.Contenu: Love what Alto has to offer BUT takes way too long for funds to show in your account to make trades! How can one get on when prices are low to make your trades??? I wish I signed up with another company that doesn't make you wait and lose out on opportunities to make trades at great timing.

Great idea, poor execution.  Terrible customer service.  In an effort to transfer another SDIRA here, I tried repeatedly to get things set up with Alto.  Only to discover that the information I was being given was false.  Once I asked them about this (and the only way to contact them is via email), they ghosted me.  Repeated emails to them over weeks have resulted in no responses.  Terrible.

Would give 2 1/2 stars if able .Crypto Roth is a great idea and great way to avoid taxes. Having to wait 7 days is way too long when transferring money to my account. I can buy immediately on Coinbase when I transfer money from my bank account.

Review.Titre: I am excited to use this service but I…
Review.Contenu: I am excited to use this service but I am disenchanted with having to wait seven days to get started. How can I refer others to use your service when I am instantly unable to. If you had made the introduction more clear as to how long my funds would be held, I may not be as disappointed as I  currently am. Upon signing up, I understood that I had to await irs verification, which has already been completed only to find my money still being held.I will review your service further and see about referring others once I am able to use the service.

Review.Titre: Failure to be able to log in…
Review.Contenu: Failure to be able to log in consistently, delays on trades..  This kind of b.s. costs customers money.  No customer support?  Don't bother responding telling me to change browsers, either.  Get it together, or I'll get out.

Review.Titre: Customer Service Leaves a Lot to Be Desired
Review.Contenu: Website is difficult to navigate. They are not responsive at all. Did not get email reply back or a phone call back after several attempts, although they claim to have very responsive service. Lately, I have been working with a gentleman named Manan, who has been very professionally pleasant, responsive and helpful. Hire more Manans!

Review.Titre: I love the opportunity to hold and…
Review.Contenu: I love the opportunity to hold and purchase crypto in my IRA. However, Alto and Capitalize seem to be still working customer services out. I have been unable to reach anyone by phone or email and get a quick answer during business hours. Emails responses seem to be sent at the end of the day and are already behind by the time I hear back. It is very frustrating. Now that all the funds are in my account trading is relatively easy. It would be great is Alto had a mobile phone app and the ability to consolidate multiple accounts so that I can see total investment without having to log out of one to go into the other. I hope things improve soon.

I found the process difficult. The website was not user friendly. Instructions were not clear.When I tried to call my contact person @ 615-326-6326, a recording said: " Not taking calls know, please call back later".So I called back later (thinking it was a time zone issue. Same recording.)So I called Customer service: 877-673-1557. The gentleman said he was not qualified to help me but he will connect me to the transfer department. Guess what? He received the same recording: Call back later!!Lastly, when I went to print my receipt for my $100., it printed three pages for the receipt!! Probably done by the same person who did your website.

I am new to crypto, and the Help or Instructions are sorely lacking. Took me three tries to invest my money. Almost afraid to go back in, almost assuredly will mess it up. Alto dashboard leaves a LOT to be desired

Getting my funds rolled over into an Alto IRA was a nightmare. There were some issues with my former employer and former custodian which delayed the process (not Alto's fault). But once Alto got the funds, it was discovered they were sent to the wrong place and it took Alto forever to find them and fund my account. The issue throughout the entire ordeal was that Alto did not communicate at all with me. Every time I tried to email, I got an automated message back with no response from a service representative. Nobody at Alto has apologized or done anything to make the situation right. It's a real shame that the customer service is so poor, because the products Alto offers are good.

Review.Titre: Alto-Prosper additional investments, lack of directions or documentation
Review.Contenu: Just starting out so this isn't a general review, just an initial point. Hard to know how to invest more money with Prosper and hard to get through for help with it.  Documentation outdated or doesn't explain process and long holds on phone support that either leads to an answering machine or hang ups.  Finally got Prosper to help me after several calls to Alto, though Prosper support didn't really understand the process either but they were able to text with Alto support and eventually we got it.  So now I know that additional investments need to be initiated from Prosper and not from Alto as one might assume.  So I'm good now, but just wish that was more plainly laid out, if not for me then for other first timers

communitcation from team was verty poor, hard to get a hold of and took over 6 weeks to transfer my ira. was very close to going to a differetn IRA platform. Luckily for you all there arent many good crypto IRAs out there

Review.Titre: 7 days is way too long to transfer in…
Review.Contenu: 7 days is way too long to transfer in cash.

Review.Titre: Responsive to Begin With, Unreachable Now
Review.Contenu: The team at Alto were extremely responsive to begin with and to get my new account funded. After trying to move funds out (the original opportunity did not come to fruition), I have not been able to reach anyone (all the customer service options lead you to voicemail, I get no response from the one direct phone number I have), email communication is delayed by multiple days or I receive no response at all, and the email response I have received just asked for information that was already included in the original email. Would like to hope this is due to being the end of the year but seems that is the time the team should have more resources and quicker response times and not the opposite. Hopeful for improvements in the future as I think they have a good model over all.
It's impossible to speak with someone on the phone. I think this company will do well. But more customer service is needed

Review.Titre: Website not allowing me to access my…
Review.Contenu: Website not allowing me to access my account since late Dec 25th and now morning of the 26th.    I hope this is not a Scam.

Review.Titre: Alto was never set up correctly to take…
Review.Contenu: Alto was never set up correctly to take Juva life business. In the end, I had to email alto to make sure the transaction completed!
Slow time for funding verification. Took a long time after funding before I was able to trade
difficult to get support on funding investments.  I've been working 2 weeks now on my latest support issue.
Very unclear how to cash out and deposit funds back into the bank.

Review.Titre: The transfers team is non existent
Review.Contenu: The transfers team is non existent. They do not respond to emails or call back. When I did get an email response, all they would respond with was a link to a FAQ.  The FAQ they kept sending me did not relate to my question and had to do with rolling over an IRA but I was rolling over 401ks. 401k rollovers are pretty straightforward. The transfers team had no idea what they were talking about, and kept telling me I needed to fill out paperwork for them to submit to my 401k administrator. 401k administrators do not accept 3rd party paperwork. The customer experience is terrible. I sent at least 5 emails asking someone to call me. They wasted my time, and they wasted their time sending all these incorrect email responses when all they had to do was pick up the phone.  With how terrible the customer experience is, there has to be a directive from leadership to not use the phones. Problems of this size within a company always comes down to leadership. I'm sure the transfers team was trying their best. They clearly were under trained, under staffed, and not supported. I asked for a call multiple times from a manager or someone who actually knew what they were talking about. This isn't a magazine subscription service. This is people's life savings. The only reason I stuck w Alto is because of their relationship with Coinbase and the options that provides for crypto choices. Terrible company. Terrible user interface. Terrible use experience. But currently, if you want to be able to choose crypto outside of the top 10 for your IRA, Alto is the only option. Maybe they know that and maybe that is why they are indifferent to the terrible experience they provide

Review.Titre: it took two weeks for a wire transfer…
Review.Contenu: it took two weeks for a wire transfer funds over ...

Review.Titre: The amount of follow up emails borders…
Review.Contenu: The amount of follow up emails borders on SPAM level.

Review.Titre: Well the phone help was non existent.
Why do it take so long to transfer…
Review.Contenu: Why do it take so long to transfer funds?

Review.Titre: Fee is just too crazy high.
Has potential, but still a long way to go
Review.Contenu: Mobile app is not super intuitive. Would prefer to see Coinbase’s interface. I can live with these, but the inability to have multiple Crypto IRA types (eg Traditional and Roth) with a single email/login is extremely inefficient and a waste of both their and our time; it also creates additional risk of compromise. Customer service is very responsive and helpful. The partnership with Coinbase Pro to lower fees for active traders is very intriguing.

Review.Titre: caution if rolling over from TSP
Review.Contenu: sorry this couldn't be a 5--you guys are actually great and do have much better customer service than others...  BUT I was rolling over from the TSP.  And you didn't even know that you can't "pull" from TSP but rather I have to "send" from them?  and you didn't know I'd have to input your address then wait a week then request the rollover (meaning 2+ weeks total before funds actually are available)?  The problem is with the TSP and IT'S rules, but, you should know and advise anyone rolling over from TSP--come'on you can't tell me I'm the first Fed retiree to use you??  or am I ??

Overall reasonable service.The big negative is that they don't participate in Yodlee. I think most Alto investors likely have enough assets to have their money invested elsewhere. And being able to see all of your assets in one place is nice. Sadly their hubris gets in the way

Review.Titre: Customer service is great, UX needs a lot of work
Review.Contenu: Customer service is great, but man UX/UI needs a ton of work.  Very confusing to understand status of investment when funding via Angelist, for example.  I had to play ping pong back and forth; ultimately concluding that Alto was erroneously stating that Angelist needed to upload documentation.  Rather, they just activated the status right on the phone.Great potential, but they really need to redesign the interface big time IMO.

Review.Titre: Signing up based on Fox News
Review.Contenu: I signed up to Alto based on your radio ads on Fox News.  I signed up for a Roth IRA to purchase crypto.  Somehow, I wasn't signed up right and then I called and somebody quickly changed to the correct account type.  A couple of other things: I wanted to purchase Digibyte crypto and found out I had to purchased something that was available through Coinbase.  I didn't know this prior.  Subsequently, I purchased Bitcoin.Also, your add on Fox News seems to indicate you and can set up an account for a minimum of $10.  Although that can probably be done, the ad does not say anything about the $100 fee to open an account.  I thought your radio ad was a little bit misleading.

Review.Titre: The Roll over process and addition…
Review.Contenu: The Roll over process and addition funding is extremely slow and makes it impossible to take advantage of market swings. You need to plan a head and leave additional cash in the account and plan on it taking a week to get there, and 3 to 4 weeks for any kind of rollover

Review.Titre: Customer support very hard to get a…
Review.Contenu: Customer support very hard to get a hold of and the process was not as simple as described and took several days longer than planned and required significant back and forth to get everything set up and funded. That being said I did get a call as a follow up from one of the support folks and they did help eventually with items but again it took a lot longer than planned.

Review.Titre: Necessary for the custodian of my…
Review.Contenu: Necessary for the custodian of my SDIRA. Painfully long process. Impossible to contact via telephone. Transfer now complete and happy it’s over.

Review.Titre: I'm still learning how to use your…
Review.Contenu: I'm still learning how to use your platform but I would like to be able to transfer crypto from Coinbase or Gemini into my IRA account.
It's quite difficult/frustrating to navigate/switch between my Alto IRA and Alto Crypto IRA account.
Very confusing process trying to transfer funds to the investment company. I was given wrong information by a guy on the phone and the website has poor instructions.

Review.Titre: I like the fact I can invest in crypto…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact I can invest in crypto through my Roth or Sep. the downside is they cannot be under the same login.
Certainly not the best experience.  Trading fees high.  Website is sparse.

I felt like our overall process wasn't amazing to transfer the money into Alto.  It was a very complex process that involved many parties.  Alto has their way of doing it, but when dealing with large amounts of money I would like to have more support than what was provided.  In the end, the money was transferred, but I just feel like there could have been more supportive.

The people and customer service has been quick and helpful, so that has been great. The user experience has also been pretty slick and easy online. The fees are high and weren't told to the investment company I did a private deal with, so we were both not prepared for the fees and it was too late to change to another IRA provider at that point.

Review.Titre: Overall pretty good company with good…
Review.Contenu: Overall pretty good company with good Selection of cryptos.  But two things are lacking I’ve found:1 It’s hard to get a complete list of cryptos that are available in the Alto IRA. Had to scroll down Alto webpage many times and write them down in my own list.  And if you could generally give category that crypto’s fall into that would be great, i.e. Hard to research on Alto as very little information is available.  2 Really be nice to have an IOS and Android app for Alto to check my account and place trades .

Service is ok for what it has to give.  Don’t expect anything comprehensive.I don’t expect Alto to be an exchange, but the UI is archaic.  Minimal fields, minimal info.  You trade crypto from a drop down selection list.  This is not how it should be done.  Don’t expect charts or historical data or anything helpful at all.  You must already be in the know and educated with crypto and then you simply execute in Alto.  Don’t expect to research and be informed/educated on the platform.  You buy and sell, that’s it.

Review.Titre: You need to speed up the funds transfer…
Review.Contenu: You need to speed up the funds transfer process (from bank account to Alto).  I don't like waiting over a week for transfers.  I know it can go faster as I pay most of my bills the same way and they process within 48 hours.  Technology allows for faster processing with lower risk.  Other than that so far so good.

Review.Titre: The Good and Not so good
Review.Contenu: Set up was easy which is great.  But, being able to have access to my funds was less than stellar.  It showed my funds arrived at Coinbase on 27 October 2021, but subsequently has now changed to 28 October.  I called and asked about investing and was told there was a 24 hour hold and was assured I could access my funds at 12:30 CST on the 28th.  Well, I couldn’t and it is now 8 hours later and I still can’t access my funds for trading.  Do better.

Review.Titre: I'd be lying if I said I'm not…
Review.Contenu: I'd be lying if I said I'm not concerned. After depositing a quarter of million dollars, I've experienced site outages, site hacks, transfer delays, and multiple links on the site that don't work. If I invested in a car or a boat for the same amount, I'd expect them to work out of the gates. But I've got my fingers crossed there are good folks in this new organization who are trying to do the right thing and are getting the bugs worked out as they go.

They sent the original paperwork to the wrong place and didn't follow up.  I called days later and the paperwork was sent to the right place right away.  However, I missed dividends this month because of their lack of following up.

Review.Titre: Easy to use but man, the fees are high.
Review.Contenu: Pros:  Very easy to setup and use, decent coin selectionCons:  The fees are 1.5% / transaction!  So if you buy and sell a coin, you will incur a 1.5 - 1.5 = 3% transaction fee.  I see that ITrustCapital's fee is just 1% / transaction.  Please become more competitive!

I chose Alto because they're based on Coinbase, whose setup and fees I'm already familiar with. However, there were several things that were not made clear to me in the marketing materials:1. Coinbase may underlie the system, but Alto has none of the features of Coinbase.2. Biggest among these is the ability to earn staking rewards.3. You also cannot move your crypto from your Coinbase account into your Alto IRA. You must first liquidate and pay taxes on the sale, then move it into the IRA. Which, if I'd known this up front, I would've set my Alto up as a Roth.I get that marketing materials are designed to get people to sign up, but things like this should definitely be clearer.

Customer support was knowledgeable and professional, I like their web interface and crypto IRA options but be aware that AltoIRA requires more work from the private companies you want to invest in than other self-directed IRA providers do. This prevented my investment from closing.

Review.Titre: This process took an excessive amount…
Review.Contenu: This process took an excessive amount of time. I’ve dealt with IRA Custodians for 40 years and this was one of my most frustrating experiences. The reason I didn’t rate this lower was that Kate and Sang were trying their best. In the end, they got it done, but someone needs to take a hard look at Alto’s procedures with Angel List, which need significant improvement.

Review.Titre: Kate Mellinger was the key to my having a successful outcome. Thanks
Review.Contenu: Kate Mellinger was great, and made the whole thing work for me. I  wasn't either getting the proper transfer paper work or made an error on my end - but I wasn't sure which. so my initial trasnfer acat was rejected.   There were also times that ALTO was I think waiting for things to be returned that  I think I may not have been given.  This was a test run for me, and it would be in my opinion very nerve racking to move large amounts of funds- while also  attempting to monitor and control my crypto exposure.

Review.Titre: Some issues but Very good to work with
Review.Contenu: Very good to work with,  just wish when there is an issue, even on my end they would not leave it hanging in balance. Wish alto would contact me to resolve instead of me looking for my investment to be there. It was a signature issue that I was not notified about until asking. No notifications about pending, please contact us. No number to call. Once I did find out, very quick response and clearing of issue. Simple to invest with

Review.Titre: Alto replied to me in a timely manner
Review.Contenu: Alto replied to me in a timely manner, however they did not do a good job of continuing to keep me informed as to what was going on and I was the one who had to keep on inquiring, when instead they could have sent me periodic email to keep me up on the process. I think they are new. New people, they will probably get better.

Not sure how it's supposed to work since it's my first time. Since I had to send a few inquiries about the status, that should tell you that the online experience wasn't exactly easy to get through. If I was to compare the Alto experience with that of e-signing loan documents to buy a house, buying a house was easier. There was no question of what steps needed to be completed, what needed to be signed, what to expect next, etc. With Alto, it was somewhat confusing. Other than that, it seems to work fine.Thank you

The website is messed up. I had all sorts of problems uploading documents. I did it multiple times and then had people emailing me that I needed to upload my documents. I couldn't even download the documents to email them in for a period of time...I was finally able to download and so I could manually upload them on the webpage, It said it worked, but then I was notified I still needed to do it. I went back to the website and there was no indication that I uploaded anything. i was finally able to download and email the scanned hard copy in. Hopefully the crypto investing process will be much more customer friendly.

Review.Titre: Had to help push the investment along
Review.Contenu: It felt like my investment was stuck, not going anywhere. Once I reached out the transaction was completed. I’m new to Alto so it may run smoother on future investments. Alto was very responsive once I reached out which I greatly appreciated.

Sign up process and bank account transfer was really easy...was impressed. However, they just stopped the checkbook LLC program which is one of the main reasons to open an SDIRA...very disappointed about that.

Review.Titre: I might be a bit harsh on giving 3…
Review.Contenu: I might be a bit harsh on giving 3 stars.  The time lapse from submitting my funds to getting them to the issuer my not be all your fault.  It might have been due to my lack of knowledge, multi country dealings, Reg A investment … Don't know.

Update- am giving 3 star. They are trying but it is screwed up - they got cyber attacked and closed down for a few weeks while trying to fix things. In the meanwhile, I made two deposits which did not show up nor did the company have the decency to communicate except to say 'we were shutdown because of a cyber attack'. If your shut down and a deposit is attempted... Anyhow, might be a good company, but my trust is not high. I will be glad to update the review if the issue is fixed. The problem is that AltoIRA was not chosen by me but by Lending Club. It seems they had a breech of security this month but there were 4 transfers for $700 that do not show in my account between July 8 and July 20th. But the transfer of July 22 does show. Not good.

Miscommunication and missed forms.It would have been a better experience if Alto helped me along this process a little more. I sent a few email asking about certain required forms. I was sent back a vague email. I tried to follow the instructions and sent a follow up email with what I thought were the correct forms It took too long to hear back from Alto saying that they were not filled out correctly. Everyone knew that I wanted to get my funds back into BTC as quickly as possible. I was not informed about a couple of missed items until later in the process which unfortunately made me wait another day to get my funds into the Sky Bridge fund. I understand that this a brand new fund... just wish the communication was better.
I was very frustrated that every time I followed a “final” step, I was then requested to do another “final” step...several times I am thankful to be past that but it was awful
Waiting for information requested Friday and Saturday. Help should not be limited to work days/hous as Crypto markets operate 24/7.

Review.Titre: Order Status Does Not Update, No current market quotes
Review.Contenu: It’s great to be able to get a hold of a customer service representative and report a problem. I don’t know how long it will take to fix it. When I put in a market order and a limit order for cryptocurrency in my crypto IRÁ my order status did not update until I tried to cancel the limit order and then it said it had already been filled. The market order never updated until I logged out of Alto and logged back in. The fill price on the market order was not very good and I know that because I was watching the price as I put my order in.  Limit orders are a much better way to go. Also, you can’t see what the market price is on the Algo website. You have to find another website to see what the current market price is so that you can set your limit orders.  I hope they can quickly get it fixed so that you can see that your orders fill right away and also so that you can get current market data on the Algo website.

Review.Titre: It's not bad, set your expectations though
Review.Contenu: Response from sales on-boarding team is solid.  They are patient, knowledgeable, and quick to respond.The transfer of funding took several weeks, via check from a brokerage account.  Quite slow and started to get me worried. If you magnify your computer text, some of the UI may be too large to fit your screen.  Try reducing your magnification or accessing with different monitor/screens.This is an observation per Coinbase, not AltoIRA: The coin selection is from Coinbase and be aware it is ethereum-based.  (I noticed some exchanges favor the blockchain they're built on, such as Binance.US has more BNC/Bep20 coins). There's still 1% transaction fee. (pionex offers 0.05%, Binance.US offers 0.1%)This is an observation per CryptoIRA's in general: You will not be able to withdraw the coins for usage: eg. staking, lending, nor decentralized financing. This currently should be seen purely as a ROTH-protected trading platform with 1% trading fee.

Review.Titre: I like the ability to trade tax free…
Review.Contenu: I like the ability to trade tax free but this site gives no info on the crypto you are about to purchase. Bid/Ask volume no indicators.

Review.Titre: since this is a new account and nothing…
Review.Contenu: since this is a new account and nothing has actually happened on the account it's hard for me to give any other review at this time.

Review.Titre: Your company is pride to provide fast…
Review.Contenu: Your company is pride to provide fast turnaround time to managing alternative investment through IRA. However, there a significant lack of prompt customer service. E.g. I request Xxxx(name omitted per request of alto) multiple times to call me back, without follow through by phone most of the time. His colleague Jxxx, is very helpful though by calling me back later.  Very frustrating to have a deadline, without being able to find anyone to talk to. There was significant difference on the name of the subscriber when filling out paperwork. I feel like I’m literally signing my money away to the trustee/alto which I had no experience  working with, e.g. I basically relinquished all the signing right (about nine permissions) to the CEO of alto. The bottom line is you have to trust a trustee that you have never worked with, by signing lots of document under deadline pressure. I wish I had more handholding and reassurance during this brand new process.

Review.Titre: AltoIRA is a breath of fresh air in the…
Review.Contenu: AltoIRA is a breath of fresh air in the crypto IRA space since it is the first to provide an IRA with reasonable fees.  But, be aware they appear to be just getting their feet on the ground and patience is required.  Your deposits to your IRA must first wait to clear before they are available in AltoIRA and then there is another wait while the deposit clears in Coinbase. Also, your trades are not reported as executed in the timeframe you may be accustomed to when trading directly with Coinbase.  My last trade last night reported it was executed about 15-30 minutes after I submitted it.  Lastly, the dashboard does not show your profit/loss on any holdings.  I hope this enhancement to the dashboard is coming soon.I believe AltoIRA is a good crypto IRA product enabling investors to make profits in crypto without the worry of paying taxes on every gain.  AltoIRA is definitely worth 5 stars once they have further developed their product.  I'm very happy to have found them.
Took 24 days from start to finish for a fund transfer. Poor responses and no oversight on the process. It’s a good idea but execution is lacking.

Review.Titre: The starting up process was difficult
Review.Contenu: The starting up process was difficult. We were set up in with the wrong forum for what we needed. It took weeks to figure that out and fix it. It did not help that it was the holiday season. AltoIRA and CryptIRA need to have clearer distinctions for future investors. I looked through the help tabs and they were not helpful at all.The assistance from support was also very delayed. We spoke to one person who could not get us to the correct platform or simply did not understand the issue. We almost pulled all the money out of this platform and were ready to go somewhere else. However, we decided to try one last thing.We scheduled a call with another person from support. His name was Dallas and he was very helpful and fast. I had emailed him the problem the night before our call and in detail explained the issue and what I was seeing on my end. He realized what was wrong, the issue was resolved the even before our scheduled call. He also tried his best to make it so we were able to start investing in cryptoIRA that very night.Once you are correctly set up, the process for buying crypto is very easy and this part is user friendly.

Review.Titre: wanted to use two IRA accounts to…
Review.Contenu: wanted to use two IRA accounts to invest with Masterworks and Alto only allows the use of one account. disappointing

Review.Titre: Better if you had an app
Review.Contenu: Better if you had an app. Website layout could be better. Concept is good though.
So far so good will update review after a few months to see how the mechanics work!
Just signed up and already asking me to rate it with minimum exposer with the app
The communication between you and Republic.co leaves much to be desired.

Review.Titre: takes too long to buy crypto probably…
Review.Contenu: takes too long to buy crypto probably won’t continue to use this site

Review.Titre: Needs better tech than a web interface
Review.Contenu: Needs better tech than a web interface. Where is the mobile App????

Review.Titre: Could be better response times via…
Review.Contenu: Could be better response times via email and website not friendly

Review.Titre: Mobile view caused lots of issues
Review.Contenu: Mobile view caused lots of issues. Requires a lot more testing.
No mobile app.  Staking not available. Easy to use.
Getting good clear communications was an issue.

Review.Titre: Takes way too long to fund
Review.Contenu: Takes way too long to fund. Not a great start

Easy to set up account. Helpful assistance with questions. On the downside, complex to set up investment in an LP and somewhat difficult process for transfer of funds to my account from the LP but has seemed to work out so far.

Review.Titre: Fee structure changes which is a pill
Review.Contenu: I wrote a review before and wanted to update. The company has been good and I've enjoyed the service. They did just change their policy to incorporate a % fee based on investment amount which I dislike. Doesn't make it much better than other services if you're comparing apples to apples. May be better in offerings available but you'll have to do your own dudiligence. Wanting to share for transparency as this was added a couple weeks ago.

The service team was very responsive and proactive in following up. I did feel like I had to do more work to get my assets transferred from my traditional IRA provider, and they were not trying to be helpful with how to move some of my assets out. It would be great to have Alto jump in to this a little more to minimize the burden of me having to figure this out.

Review.Titre: Great progress need a bit more
Review.Contenu: Great to see Alto new launch and progress. Three things I would like to see improve. 1. No ACAT, please can we enable that. Currently disjointed online and offline process of paper to transfer funds from another custodian. 2. Would have like to see new additional investment choices, waiting for them:) . 3. Way to add more beneficiary information especially people living overseas.

Review.Titre: Most of the process of establishing an account was easy and seamless, but...
Review.Contenu: Most of the process of establishing an account is straightforward, but once I had it going, trying to invest in a not-already-established venue is a bit tricky, with things like a "call" being required.  But I didn't know that for 3 days, until I asked Lindsey why, when I was told 3 days earlier that everything was a go for the transfer of funds, nothing was moving.  Turns out the investee had to place a "call" before funds could be transferred.  Not a big deal, but a bit frustrating.  Otherwise, I'd have given the process 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Process wasn't always intuitive, but GREAT overall!
Review.Contenu: The process wasn't always intuitive, from getting money into a new Crypto IRA account, to then using it to invest in Crypto and give shape to the IRA. Alto could use more and better 'in process' helps and information all along the way especially for those new to the Crypto world. However, their support team has been very responsive and very willing to help all along, which made up for any lack within the software and tools. Very happy so far, overall!

Good things:- Customer support and overall response is 5 star- Fees are the lowest between the IRA crypto institutions. 1% buy and 1% sell.Things that can be improved:- Coinbase trading fees are now much lower, why not lower it on the IRA accounts so we can buy and sell when we really want. Or offer this yearly payment program coinbase offers.- Would be nice to offer an earn program on stable coins and other coins. Partner with Nexo or some good lending platforms.- Would be nice to offer staking.
The company was very professional regarding user experience. That said, I made the mistake of investing in crypto. I will never do that again.
Excellent customer service both through email and phone. Questions were answered thoroughly. Fees for each account type should be more up front and clearly stated before the account opening process.

Review.Titre: Great service, but needs more features
Review.Contenu: Alto allows me to invest in crypto in the only place that I have money available, my retirement account, which is awesome!!! However, the fees create a disincentive to trade and the inability to stake makes you get diluted by others who can. I have no doubt they will improve and allow you to take full advantage of what crypto has to offer.
The site worked well. Users need to exercise caution using the site as a wrong answer to a question is difficult to undo without contacting very helpful customer support.
