Overall the process was relatively smooth with the exception of a minor issue finalizing my asset transfer from E-Trade. However, that was promptly addressed. I was very glad that Alto staff kept me updated regularly and quickly followed up on any concerns/questions.

Review.Titre: Not a good start - but recovered well
Review.Contenu: I signed up with AltoIRA and initiated a transfer from my Principal account. Principal sent the wire on 7/21/2022 and AltoIRA acknowledged getting it on 7/22/2022. I was told that transferring my funds into Coinbase would take "up to one business day". So far so good! Then things took a turn. The transfer of my funds into Coinbase was mysteriously cancelled on 7/22 and the funds remain unavailable. Repeated inquiries have resulted in polite, but unhelpful responses: "I've opened a ticket", "We're trying to see what's going on", etc. If I had wanted to just let my funds sit there, I could have stayed with Principal. I'm a day or two from just initiating a transfer out of AltoIRA and into any one of the many other options available out there. So as of now, I can't recommend AltoIRA, they've gotten off to a poor start.Update: not long after this review, AltoIRA was able to complete the transfer and make my funds available. And after that initial glitch, things have been much smoother.

Review.Titre: Hard for me to tell if some of the…
Review.Contenu: Hard for me to tell if some of the issues where on our end or Alto's end, but process took longer than I expected.  However, the customer service as outstanding and the interfaces are very well done.

Review.Titre: I am very pleased with the site and…
Review.Contenu: I am very pleased with the site and ease of navigating and purchasing of assets. Although, a great number of crypto is available, there are some projects that are not available that I wish were.

Review.Titre: Alto is great on email support
Review.Contenu: Alto is great on email support, but when it comes to getting someone on the phone, good luck!  They are very under stiff for phone support; I was never able to get them on the Phone.  They would put me on hold, then after about 10 minutes, hang up on me!  How rude.  I thought if I became a client, they would judge my call as a VIP and answer my call, but no such luck. I prefer phone support because it's so much quicker that typing out an email.

Review.Titre: Customer service to restore access via…
Review.Contenu: Customer service to restore access via password and code worked great.  Took couple of days though.

AFTER A VERY EXTENDED PERIOD OF TIME GETTING AN ACCOUNT SET UP, IT WAS EASY MAKING PURCHASES.JENNIFER AND KIELY WERE VERY HELPFUL IN GETTING MY ACCOUNT AND 2-FACTOR AUTHENTIFICATION SET UP AND I AM VERY THANKFUL FOR ALL THEIR ASSISTANCE.
Overall I was very pleased with the process. The only reason I didn’t give five stars is that the transfer of funds to Coinbase took longer than what was explained to me.
Thank you for your platform.The roll over went smooth and the communication was spot on.My Roth is now investing in something I believe in.

Review.Titre: The staff on the phone was very helpful…
Review.Contenu: The staff on the phone was very helpful and polite. Also, the communication via text and email were timely. It would be nice to set up transfer via ACH with our bank vs. a third party software.
• Customer service was very professional, prompt, and expert • Automation of some steps would’ve made experience better• Overall quite good and cool
There are some things you just won't allow. Staking, one login for 2 accounts, one price to convert coins...

Review.Titre: Worked well with a slight problem…
Review.Contenu: Worked well with a slight problem connecting to the investment co.  Also accidentally pulled two allocations of funds instead of the one requested.
Was a pretty easy process - took some time to get approved which I was surprised with but ok

Review.Titre: The representatives were very good at…
Review.Contenu: The representatives were very good at their jobs and were helpful answering my questions.

Review.Titre: The customer service rep was very…
Review.Contenu: The customer service rep was very friendly and helpful.
Good response time on email. It would be nice to have a number to call as an option

Review.Titre: Need to make bank transfers quicker…
Review.Contenu: Need to make bank transfers quicker than 7 days.

So far, I haven't had much time to utilize the platform (trading, etc.), but the onboarding experience was great. An Alto representative immediately contacted me about a rollover I initiated and helped as the process completed over the course of a few days (the time delay was not Alto's fault). Looking forward to using the service more! One suggestion: mobile app 😉. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Alto IRA - pretty good but didn't get contact back
Review.Contenu: Received this email from Alto to write a review.  I had some trouble funding my outside investment with their partner affiliates.  It ended up getting done, but I did send a request to Alto for some assistance and received no communication back.  Thankfully, the partner affiliate reached out directly when I contacted their site and the investment was then funded.  It is a good self-directed IRA, I just don't fully understand what the disconnect was and is.

Review.Titre: Online platform offering digital management of your IRA
Review.Contenu: Online platform offering streamlined, digital management of your IRA. Issuers use the same digital platform to upload your deals so the investment process is fast all around. AltoIRA does not yet have an app but the browser interface is simple and seamless. Alto supports alternative assets like pre-IPO equities. They do not yet support listed stocks—hopefully they will soon.
Service is relatively new so still experiencing some growing pains but a) the customer service is responsive and b) the variety of alternative investments is growing.

Solid representatives and great communication.I filled out info to open account and that went smooth, them dealt with my bank TD to get the money out of my IRA-CD and TD fumbled there, no fault of Alto. The bonus to it all was days went by before TD resolved their issues and in the mean time my Alto crypto account passed the 7days no trading compliance rule. So no sooner the funds landed in account I was literally buying every cyrpto I had on my list! Good times. Lets see if cryptos now become something of value over next decade!

Alto IRA’s customer support was fantastic in getting me set up with my crypto IRA. I’m very happy to be able to add these alternative investments to my portfolio. My one gripe is that Alto doesn’t offer crypto staking or an earn feature with their crypto selections. That would be a HUGE and I believe, necessary addition needed ASAP. All-in-all I’m happy with my choice of using Alto. The application & setup process was a breeze, and the friendly support is there when you need it.

Review.Titre: Customer service makes up for flaws
Review.Contenu: Customer service makes up for flaws.  1.  Overly complex process to transfer a rollover check you receive from a custodian and send to Alto.  2. System didn’t automatically and timely update my dashboard on a limit buy order.  Update took over 12 hours plus a call to customer service.

Review.Titre: Alto, a trusted resource for alternative investments
Review.Contenu: Alto appears to be a trusted resource for alternative investing and retirement planning.   I look forward to capitalizing on the ease of use, and quick access to support.The only drawback to setting up an account will be if the bank that you use to fund the account is not listed in the Plaid application Alto uses. There is no resolution for that at this time, although there are alternative methods to fund your account.  I started a checking account with a bank that was recognized in the Plaid app, and local to me.  Funding my account was simple at that point.

Review.Titre: Transfer from LPL IRA to Alto IRA for…
Review.Contenu: Transfer from LPL IRA to Alto IRA for an investment via website was somewhat confusing.  Web site stated I needed a Medallion Gold stamp was required from my Broker (LPL).  When contacted LPL only does Medallion Gold stamped on $250,000.00 or higher.  It would have been easier if I was told to have LPL just send a check with my "wet" signature.  Alto was very helpful in setting up my account, only when the transfer needed to occur is where I had some issues.

A snafu and a fixThere was a time lapse between the check being deposited at Alto and the funds moving to my account because more paperwork needed to be filed.  The snafu was that it was not obvious that this was necessary.  The fix was that the "help desk" was extremely helpful and timely in their responses. Since initially funding my account, I have asked several questions and have had timely responses both by email and by phone.  The people who help new users like me get 5 stars.  Also getting 5 stars is the ease of trading.

Review.Titre: I've had a good experience with alto…
Review.Contenu: I've had a good experience with alto overall with one exception. The time between opening my account and being funded was slow. Almost a month. The slowest part was when Alto received my funding and held it for approximately two weeks before releasing it. I could be wrong, but that seemed very excessive in today's world. Customer service was friendly along the way.

Review.Titre: The customer service and selection are…
Review.Contenu: The customer service and selection are A+ top notch. I have to give 4 stars however because like most of crypto, the website UI/UX is clunky.  The team helped update my paperwork but the website still says it's outstanding. Also the website is not the easiest to navigate and I sometimes just find it easier to log off and then back in. Once this is updated you got a race horse here!

I was not able to roll my ROTH 401k over to ALTO.  However, I was advised before that it was unlikely I would be able to as I was still employed.- that said, I opened an account anyway.  -- Not crazy about the 5 day settlement period.  But the main competitor Itrust Capital wanted $2500 to open the account and I wasn't comforable with that.  -- That said, so far so good.

Review.Titre: It's like having Coinbase access with…
Review.Contenu: It's like having Coinbase access with your IRA which is cool, trades are not instantaneous however, and they charge 1.5% of the transaction amount per trade But hey it's still not as bad as Eth gas fees. It's Good if you're a hodler and you want exposure to crypto and you trust Coinbase. Unfortunately due to the nature of IRA custodial accounts you don't have the option to move your holdings to a cold wallet.

Very responsive process. Simple and well communicated. Money transfer process could be better automated where you don’t need to repeat steps every time  you do new transfer…..and lower minimum need per transfer so money doesn’t have to sit in account unused until needed.

Everyone I have dealt with at the company has been very helpful but I don't like not having any options in regards to staking, DeFi, NFTs, etc.  Hopefully you will offer something like the interest that Coinbase offers, at a minimum, in the near future.

Everything has been good so far with Alto CryptoIRA it’s very simple to place trades. The reason it doesn’t get 5 stars is because of the 1.5% fee I wish it was lower it eats up my profit, and I wish they had an app so I could access it and make trades on my cell phone easier instead of the web browser. Hopefully these changes will take place in the future

So far, I have been using this app for a few weeks and have REALLY liked what I have seen, experienced, and read within this app! It has a great user interface, is very easy to use and navigate, fast load times, and all-around straightforward and seamless.

I just completed my first self directed investment on the Alto platform. The process went relatively smoothly. Since this was an investment in a private company that was not on the Alto platform, there were a few extra steps to go through. I was able to connect with Josh in Support and he was very helpful. It would be good for Alto to provide more detailed explanation of the process of getting an investment done that is not on the Alto partner list. This was not a big obstacle, but added a few steps to the process and took a couple of days longer than originally expected.

Review.Titre: The account opening process is great, but...
Review.Contenu: The account opening process is great, but...waiting the 7 days restriction even though the money has been transferred in is not acceptable. Should have an option to waive that restriction. When I fund my ROTH IRA account at a brokerage firm and the funds clear in 24 hours, I can trade immediately. Also, need to have a better interface for trading cryptos. The delay in pricing information and in reporting an execution even though you are using Coinbase which replies instantly when trading directly seems unusual.

Review.Titre: It was very easy to set up my Alto…
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to set up my Alto CryptoIRA account.  I was able to jump right in and make trades after the required 7-day period.  My only suggestion for improvement is to include more Crypto investments.  I could only find 2 of the names I am interested in.  At least it's a start.

The website did a great site setting my expectations.  Fortunately, I don't need much hand holding and got everything done that I needed.The only comment I have is the slowness in communication.  Twice I called and left voice mails with specific questions but never received a return call.While I did get some personalized emails, when I asked questions it took at least a day before I received a response.For a client who likes to be self directed, I would highly recommend Alto.

Louis was very knowledgeable and responsive in helping me with my investment.  The experience with the rollover process could have better as there should be an option to indicate you are initiating a check-based distribution from a previous employer 401k plan.  It is not always possible to state the value of the rollover until securities are sold.

Review.Titre: On boarding has been good so far
Review.Contenu: On boarding has been good so far. Jimmy has been good about reaching out and making sure I am on track. I have made my first trade and it was easy. I have no complaints at all so far other than funds are slow to get to the account but really it is only a few days. If you are  patient you will be happy.  Thank you.

Everything is Good , However Taking Long time to Get Fund Transfer & Available to Trade .  Has Coinbase account also they allow instant Trading upon ACH perform . Here also my CIRA account linked with Coinbase then why not immediately Trading permitted ? In 2-3 days lots changes

Alto is great! Super easy to use and the value  of a self directed IRA that allows trading in all major crypto is amazing in itself. I would absolutely recommend Alto and I can’t imagine an IRA being much easier; my only complaint is actually with coinbase, who Alto uses as an exchange, and their lack of new, promising projects that I would like to pour more of my money into! Thanks, Alto. I would say you’ve changed my life with your IRAs

Generally speaking, Alto's response is fast and accurate, and cares about customers' experience. It also allows regular Roth and crypto Roth. This combination is very useful for people looking forward to strong development in digital arenas.
Great Reps.,  Who Follow up and do the Job Right.

New to your service, so giving four stars since service has been good so far.  I did have an onboarding issue concerning funding my account.  Your site does not seem to be capable of handling names such as mine that contain an apostrophe.  Needed to remove the apostrophe to get past an Unexpected error  500.

Review.Titre: Very satisified with people but process can be improved
Review.Contenu: Overall - very good experience with the ALTO people.  Quick to respond, easy to work with, can fix issues quickly.  ALTO needs to fix the automatic sweeping of funds into Coinbase once they arrive in the ALTO account.  This fund transfer needs to be done on a manual basis by the account holder.  Took several days to get this money back out of Coinbase and into another standard account. Would highly recommend the ALTO IRA based on customer service, speed in correcting my "sweeping" issue, and access to a large enough selection of Coinbase crypto coins to buy.

Generally good but hiccups by not being told about medillion signatures needed , wasn’t familiar with my prior IRA trust company and took a few emails to get link to company I wanted to invest in to work the first time . Eventually worked out .

My only “complaint” is the time it takes to do a ROTH conversion and have funds available.  During that wait time, prices increased and I bought at higher than I wanted.  Otherwise, smooth operation and significantly better than iTrust Capital.

Executing a buy was slow.  It took a day to get a response that my trade went through.  Looks like you're using coinbase.  I have a separate account there and it takes seconds to execute.  Not sure whether the price was when I elected to buy or when the trade was executed.

Review.Titre: I love the ability to invest not only…
Review.Contenu: I love the ability to invest not only in a traditional IRA but a crypto IRA and gives me a variety of choices and coins that I can invest in my only disappointment is that it doesn't have a app yet that makes it a little easier to access and track my investments in real time.
Love the idea of having this account. Great app.

Review.Titre: Overall I was pretty happy with…
Review.Contenu: Overall I was pretty happy with interface and customer service. The one thing that annoyed me was the fee structure, which was masked and not fully disclosed until time and energy was set up. It is not as inexpensive as they lead you to believe.

Review.Titre: Im excited that there's an IRA option…
Review.Contenu: Im excited that there's an IRA option for crypto! However, my initial contribution was bumpy: several days after I initiated my first transfer I got notice that it had failed due to technical problems. So I had to start from the beginning---entering bank snd account info.

I funded my Alto IRA with my Vanguard retirement and the process was very quick. I was assured by Alto customer care that the funds would be available "right away" for a wefunder investment that I wanted to make. "Right away" actually means 2-3 business days which was divulged after I opened my account. Other than that inaccuracy, my first investment was ok.

Review.Titre: new company hits the ground running!
Review.Contenu: Company, customer service investments are too new to give an authorities review, but so far the funding process and response from CS have been stellar.partnering relations ships are a+ but would like to see more info and education on the site. fee structure although stated is a little hazy to me as far as how it is appliedlooking forward to the app hopefully coming out soon.JW

Review.Titre: It would be nice to try and reduce the…
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to try and reduce the transfer time of funds. I realize this is not always in your control, but perhaps offering instructions or estimates on how fast each method will take (from historical averages) would be useful for the investor to make decisions. For example, I chose to transfer by check (trying to reduce any wire fees), but it seemed to take almost 2 weeks which I find excessively slow.

Review.Titre: Waiting on the mobile app is all…
Review.Contenu: I would give a 5 star if a mobile app was already offered. I know your working on it. But, other than that, the service seems to be working well. Just takes a while for the money to get in the account.

Review.Titre: I seem to have figured it out
Review.Contenu: I seem to have figured it out, though understanding what is the responsibility of AltoIRA and what is the responsibility of Carofin has been mostly trial-and-error.I submitted two questions to your help window.  I answered the first question myself, and the second question was answered by Carofin.  So I have no unresolved issues at the moment.

Review.Titre: Great job so far! I actually have some additional feedback….
Review.Contenu: I actually have some additional feedback that I’d like to provide you guys. Could someone give me a call at 650-906-6920. I think you have a massive opportunity in front of you and I’d love to help you hit the ball out of the park with additional features.

Review.Titre: Great to have the email reminders to…
Review.Contenu: Great to have the email reminders to fund my account. Encouraged me to take the next steps in moving my funds over from my IRA account. One thing I didn’t feel super secure about was the lack of security protocols used when I called customer service related to my transfer. There was no security verification or validation that I was who I said I was and that’s slightly concerning.

Review.Titre: Setting up the Alto account was easy…
Review.Contenu: Setting up the Alto account was easy and the dashboard is user friendly. Thank you. Alto also has some great cryptocurrencies and will probably become an industry leader due to low fees and low bar of entry. Many crypto IRA services may not do so well because of high fees and high entry costs due to greed. Alto does not have this myopic attitude and seems to be more customer orientated, which is becoming rarer in modern companies, Also, Alto has real people to solve customer service problems, and not just computer systems to send you into an endless loop like some. Well done and best of luck with your company.

Review.Titre: There are less features than I would…
Review.Contenu: There are less features than I would like to but the transaction was easy.There should be an option to verify by phone in addition to google authenticator. I upgraded my phone and now the google authenticator does not give me a code anymore.

Review.Titre: The concept is relatively new to me
Review.Contenu: The concept is relatively new to me, so there was a learning curve for me to get my account started.  James and Kate in customer service were very helpful and now I look forward to having my self-directed IRA with AltoIRA.  The savings will be substantial.  Now they just need to establish a way to have any cash in the account swept into an interest-bearing account.

Review.Titre: Ok to be honest I have not had a bad…
Review.Contenu: Ok to be honest I have not had a bad problem or trouble figuring out the trading process. I had a question and called and low and behold someone answered the phone. They where nice and very polite and willing to answer my question. But the only thing I am not happy with the dash board. I am an active stock trader and am use to seeing all the information. Position information for each coin example, my cost basis, what the coin is worth at that time, market value, daily and total gains. This is just me. I can see my account balance but it would be nice to see the coin balance whether up or down on that position. Other then that happy i found you.

Review.Titre: So far so good with Alto still with…
Review.Contenu: So far so good with Alto still with them despite the hack. Trying to confirm with coin base that they do storage for Alto because there is such little information on them. Hopefully a legit company. Never be too sure lots of scams in Crypto.

Review.Titre: AltoIRA makes it easy for investing in Startupd
Review.Contenu: I invested in a Startup using my IRA money through AltiIRA as my regular investment would not approve in Startups. I found AltoIRA very helpful in making smooth transition. So far I am very happy with their service. Of course I may need their help when the time comes for calculating my RMD for investing in Startups

Couldn’t decide between three or four.  Transfer took a long time to credit after you had check. Don’t like the trading platform because can’t see current market price.  Do like ability of limit orders.  Time will tell.

Great company, good customer service. They respond quicker by email. If they could upgrade the product to include crypto stop market orders, it would be an amazing product and would allow investors to protect there investments.

Enjoying the Alto platform but haven't had enough experience yet to determine how good support actually is.  So far, the support has been good but we haven't really had any serious issues to contend with to this point.  On easy stuff the support is good though.

Review.Titre: Getting started in my cryptoIRA was…
Review.Contenu: Getting started in my cryptoIRA was smooth and easy. One concern: the confirmation price is not immediate like on the cash app and strike apps???I wish your platform allowed for DCA for my cryptoIRA.

I have recently opened an account with Alto. The process was pretty easy to get completed. Afterwards it takes seven days before you can do anything, but then you can go and put buy orders in for what you want. I love the fact that they have so many different assets to choose from but I wish the trade fees were lower. I understand that this is supposedly a 1.5% trading fee that is charged by Coinbase, but I would think that a large firm like this could negotiate that fee down a good amount. But maybe that is how Alto makes their money on these accounts since there are no other fees. Overall I would give the service a 4 out of 5 and only say that I would like to see some lower fees. Everything else is great so far.

Transferring funds was simple. Creating orders was simple. Filling was slow. Sometimes even market orders took more than 10 minutes to get filled. For market orders, fees are subtracted from the order amount which reduces the amount used to buy (I am not used to that). For limit orders, fees are not subtracted from the order amount which I like. Order history seems to keep only one line per order. Once the order is filled, the order placement history seems to be just overwritten. Most annoying is even when I am working, within short break I am timed out and have to login again. There does not seem to be any place to control that time. There is no way to see any charts. I hope more features will be added.

Good service overall, and a user-friendly interface. My only complaint is having to resolve questions only via a submission form online; having a phone number to call would be a great help, especially for someone who is new and may have questions.

i had to open a support request with wefunder to get my first investment in alto - there were apparently AltoIRA api problems, accrding to them. i still can't find a way to do this on republic. oh, well, growing pains! everything worked out (or will work out).

Review.Titre: So far so good with Alto
Review.Contenu: So far so good with Alto.  Best things:  very prompt and effective customer service (the aforementioned Kate & James), partnership with the investment platform i do business with and relatively easy to use.   Areas to improve:  website is pretty basic (functionally it's fine, but it has a rather dated look and is overall rather inelegant), FAQs really need to be more complete (to hasten self-service) and Alto needs to find a way to provide REGISTERED USERS the necessary banking info to properly set up accounts (as it is now, you MUST get this info from them via inquiry = an unnecessary extra step).

Review.Titre: The weak point of the journey was a…
Review.Contenu: The weak point of the journey was a lack of knowing the status of  completion.  After the information was provided, I never heard a thing. The other was duplication of requirements for documentation.
So far so good... only "wish" is that I wish AltoIRA had an app to quickly and easily access your IRA investments on the go.   Currently only accessible via desktop online platform.

Review.Titre: I like having a vehicle to invest my…
Review.Contenu: I like having a vehicle to invest my 401k money into crypto. I think the website could use some work to provide some analytics to the customers. I like the ability to submit limit orders.
I’m new to this and just set up an account. Still learning how this works but so far, things are running smoothly. Website is user friendly, and the “help” tab explains answer questions.

Review.Titre: I was happy that when I wrote an email…
Review.Contenu: I was happy that when I wrote an email about a problem I always  received a phone call the next day. I would of wished I could of called someone at the time though but understand.
Easy to set up.  Easy to transfer funds in.  Don't know yet about transferring funds out.  I did not see information about a waiting period after transferring funds.

Review.Titre: Alto Crypto IRA Account from existing Alto Traditional IRA
Review.Contenu: Opened a Alto Crypto IRA Account, went pretty well, was able to easily transfer funds from my Alto Traditional IRA, but still have to wait 7 days to invest in anything.

Review.Titre: The app and the transaction great
Review.Contenu: The app and the transaction great. What I would like to see is a stop loss and somewhere where we can put our coins on to get interest.

Review.Titre: This was a very easy process
Review.Contenu: This was a very easy process! The only reason I did not give this review a 5/5 was the fact I could not buy XRP crypto in my Roth IRA.
it works pretty easily.  For those with a 401k solo that have more confidence to manage alternative investments as their own trustee that's probably a cheaper option

Review.Titre: It was a little hard getting info at…

Review.Titre: Very easy transfer from a Vanguard 401k…

Professional with good response time.

Review.Titre: I am a new client of Alto
Review.Contenu: I am a new client of Alto.  The onboarding process is a bit more complex than just signing up online.  This is for security reasons, which I appreciate.  The communication and response time with Alto was excellent.  Website has good layout and easy to navigate and do what you need to do.  So far, I'm impressed and highly recommend Alto.

Review.Titre: good service, simple account set up, coin suggestions
Review.Contenu: Good selection of crypto on partner exchange, Coinbase, but highly suggest you lobby them to add XRP, XDC, LUNC (luna classic), VOLT (V2) and SHI (shina inu) to their coin list/offering (and then integrate into ALTO platform too.) These are coins that will  perform VERY well imo. Thus far I have experienced good service and ease of account set up. Will likely transfer or fund more to my account in future.

We evaluated 6 different self directed Ira companies for doing our own real estate investment. We picked alto on price (not the least expensive but because they don’t charge based on investment size the pricing was fair), online capability, live phone support if needed (it wasn’t), web experience, and simplicity of fees.  It took us about 10 minutes to setup our accounts, and funding was easier. Setup of an investment vehicle requires a lot of approvals from us, the real estate folks and alto, but all Automatted and only took a few days. Very nice support for our first time.
Fast and efficient, he was professional and easy to talk to

I needed some of my IRA funds quickly transferred in order to meet very tight time constraints related to an investment opportunity that looked strong to me. Max, at Alto jumped in and took me step by step through everything and finalized the transfer the day prior to the closing of the opportunity. Alto is strong, thorough and timely. Thanks to Max, ALTO and the team there, i will be a customer for life.
So far, I'm satisfied with Alto. The fees are high (1%), but until there are more options to trade crypto inside a traditional investment vehicle like an IRA, there isn't much of a choice.

Review.Titre: I've enjoyed the options Alto makes available
Review.Contenu: Alto makes investing in real estate deals easy. I use the "bring your own deal" option in their platform. From this, I work with a real estate flipper to construct a promissory note and put my money to work while watching houses being improved in communities. This option allows me to return a higher rate than traditional stocks allocations. Alto fees are one of the lowest I've research in a SDIRA account and their support staff is always helpful.

Working with AltoIRA has been such a seamless delightful experience! From my initial inquiries to after the deal close, Jen Smith, Lindsey Johnson, and Whitney Dawson were incredibly kind, responsive, diligent, supportive, professional and just all around ALL STARS! They made a time-sensitive, nerve-wrecking experience for me so much more manageable and less stressful. I trust both of them fully and plan to continue working with Alto on future deals because of how well they took care of me. Thank you all & the entire Alto team!!!

Review.Titre: Agent Jenn Smith made purchasing SpaceX…
Review.Contenu: Agent Jenn Smith made purchasing SpaceX shares thru FPG an easy and seamless experience. She called and followed up along the way. Very prompt in answering questions. Kudos!

Between a couole of the alternative asset managers AltoIRA is my preferred choice. It has always been straigtforward to get an answer and get support, as well as onboard the deals. AltoIRA has also improved a lot both in the efficiency of it's processes and the application portal. I am looking forward to continue with the service for years to come.

Review.Titre: Fast & Easy IRA funds transfer for private placement
Review.Contenu: I needed to move money from a Traditional IRA into an SDIRA quickly in order to meet a deadline for a private equity placement deal with one of their partner companies. The team at Alto exceeded my expectations during the holiday season and their site made it a simple process to wire the funds.I was surprised that I was able to complete everything within a few days with absolutely no issues. The fees at Alto are lower than another SDIRA service that I've used in the past, so that's another plus.

Carson Krigbaum was extremely responsive and provided the correct steps in the transfer process the first time. My transfer of some extra cash back to another IRA was completed in 2 days. Alto's platform is in a league of its own. Thanks! Brian

Alto representative, Jennifer’s support and assistance was superb. Her patience and due diligence guiding the processing of my investing funds transaction is much appreciated. Other Alto clients will be in good hands if she is at the helm. I could not have accomplished this feat without her personal assistance. The next time I encounter difficulty I will certainly seek her out. Jennifer, thank you.

The entire setup experience has gone very smoothly. Customer support and guidance is excellent. I have made a few purchases online with no problem. The transaction cost is reasonable and I love having access to all the coins/tokens on Coinbase. I have researched a few similar services and Alto easily comes out on top.

Alto has some of the best customer service that I have experienced with financial services companies. They respond quickly via email. They are quick to understand your needs/issues. They are not just trying to charge you fees. I decided that I did not want to invest in "Alt" investments any longer. I asked about transferring funds and closing my account. They treated me as if I was the best customer through the whole process. If you want to invest in "Alt" securities I highly recommend Alto for the great service you will receive all the time.
Simply put, ALTO offers a CRYPTO Roth IRA, and while everyone else is losing their shirts buying stocks, at least with a ROTH IRA, you won't have to PAY TAXES on any potential crypto gains.

ALTO made it easy to transfer money into the account so that I could make an investment.  I used the tools on its website -- they were clear, instructive and complete.  I was also provided instructions for next steps to ensure the transaction was made accurately and on time.  The entire process was seamless.  Thank you ALTO!

Review.Titre: With the crypto market so volatile I am…
Review.Contenu: With the crypto market so volatile I am checking how my investment in Alto is doing more frequently.  Your 2-step validation is quick and efficient and I was able to ponder my investment, thinking about where I might invest more now that we are in a new year.  Thank you for asking.

Review.Titre: Alto is a big upgrade to my old crypto…
Review.Contenu: Alto is a big upgrade to my old crypto IRA at Choice / Kingdom Trust. Alto actually has real limit orders that are good till canceled. (Choice's dumb version of "limit orders" cancel daily at 24:00 UTC.)

Review.Titre: Unlocked money trapped in old 401ks to invest in alternative assets.
Review.Contenu: Rolled over old 401ks into a self-directed AltoIRA because I didn’t want my money to sit idle or worse, dwindle as the stock market dips. Now I’m invested in alternative assets like fine art, farmland and commercial real estate in a way that I would never have been able to do with funds sitting in traditional IRAs. Thank you Alto team for helping unlock my money and give me more options to diversify my investments!!

Review.Titre: Transfer of Funds - The young lady who took my call quickly…
Review.Contenu: The young lady who took my call quickly and courteously help me resolve my concern and issue.She was very professional and well-suited to assist me.Thanks for the great customer service.

Review.Titre: I have multiple accounts with Alto and…
Review.Contenu: I have multiple accounts with Alto and love them. Only annoying thing is you need a different email for each account and I’m running out of emails because I keep opening new accounts. But the fact that I have multiple accounts should say great things about Alto.

Review.Titre: I put funds in Alto in about April to…
Review.Contenu: I put funds in Alto in about April to be ready for a land investment when one came along. The money sat there until August when I wanted to make an investment. At that point I paid the yearly fee ($100.00) and the $10.00 investment fee and made an investment on the Acre trader platform. There were several screens to navigate and conditions to read and agree to, and the investment process took me probably about half an hour between going back and forth between the two platforms. By the next day I had conformation that the money had been sent for the investment I wanted to make. I am guessing that I will continue to pay the annual fee by credit card as long as I maintain this SDIRA. It worked for me and now I have a more diverse portfolio than I had before.

I initially tried to open an account with the OTHER IRA company that is advertised everywhere.  They refused to open an account for me stating that there was an error with the KYC process.  I emailed their customer service, but never got a response.  I will never know what the problem was.I found Alto IRA easily with an internet search, and I couldn't be happier. It was very easy to open and fund my account.  They've reached out to me to make sure I'm happy with their service.  However, I haven't needed anything.  Everything has been so easy. They have a huge selection of crypto to choose from, and my account is nicely diversified.

Review.Titre: The customer service team is the best…
Review.Contenu: The customer service team is the best I've worked within financial services. Clearly smart and always solutions oriented. I honestly love how effective they are — it gives full confidence in the company. 7/5 stars.
Easy process for opening account and responsive account representatives made sure everything was done properly and in a timely manner.

Setting up and funding my Alto IRA was as seamless a process as possible. Once funded, I was easily able to quickly invest in my security of interest. I know I'll continue to use Alto long into the future!

OK My experience with ALTO IRA has been Fantastic,They have the Crypto I am looking for and when I buy the Crypto it is SUPER FAST.I just wish I would use my Debt Card to Fund My Account like Coin-base Does. I hope that they get the Debt Card Funding thing done ASAP, because it would be so much faster than having to wait 3 to 5 days. Other than that ALTO is Super Great, I wish I knew about them Sooner.Ron M

It has been a pleasure working with Terry. He did an awesome job of assisting me with opening my new account with Alto and provided top notch customer service. I needed to reverse a Roth IRA and do a backdoor Roth IRA. Josh walked me through it step-by-step over a series of several phone calls. He was professional, courteous, and helpful. I appreciate his help.

Review.Titre: Everyone I spoke with was professional…
Review.Contenu: everyone I spoke with was professional and helpful,and Jenn Smith my advisor was expedient and helpful to get my investment done.

Review.Titre: Long wait on the phone for a Rep
Review.Contenu: Long wait on the phone for a Rep, but she was patient with me and answered all of my questions, which were many. Alto has been in transition for what seems like a long time, and there have been some frustrating things to deal with as a customer. In the past I have talked to Alto Reps and have hung up feeling like the only info I walked away with was so generic that it was basically useless. But this call was the opposite. I recvd info that was substantive and helpful. Any concern about where Alto was going has been addressed. And thank you for that

I appreciate the proactive reaching out. I only heard of Alto recently so is "new to me" and is dealing in the crypto space. Lots of people are getting burned in this space and thus I was a little worried moving over my IRA. But knowing there were real people on the other side helped me feel comfortable. I talked to people via email and on the phone and it helped me feel good about making the move. So far I am very happy I made the move.

Review.Titre: I HAD A GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE…

Alto gives different types of investing options from traditional to IRA structured portfolio. Signing up is very easy, simple anyone can do it.You can also transfer funds from your preexisting 401k, IRA, or company retirement accounts (listed).For future improvements Alto should have a custodial wallet for its customers or allow internet crypto wallet extensions. Credited crypto wallets should be listed, suggested or provided by Alto or another regulated third party wallet provider with (self custodial wallet(s). It's the most important improvement needed. A self custodial wallet provided or optional options of wallets/wallet extensions. " Not you keys Not your crypto".

Jenn was excellent supporting my on boarding with multiple accounts, rollovers and conversion. The help desk was also very helpful in answering questions about availability of crypto coins and other assets depending on the account.
Just a great company. Friendly staff and just overall wonderful experience since I signed up. I will continue to do business with alto for many years to come.

The fact that you can have a crypto ROTH IRA is a GODSEND!! This means I can make crypto trades based on the four year cycles of bitcoin and cash out at the top of the market without having to pay taxes on my gains...EVER!!  So excited to make lots of money for retirement in this catch-up strategy!

Their support is great. The product is also great, but I had to put my account on a pause since crypto market is really not going anywhere. But nonetheless, their customer support is really good.
My experience with Alto was seemless and very professional. I'm new to the investment arena, so the top flight customer service was a blessing. Thank U So Much.
Jennifer was knowledgeable and helpful.   I will work with the Alto team again, much better to work with a person than trying to do it yourself online.

Alto IRA also offers a wide range of investment options, including alternative assets such as real estate and private equity, which can help diversify your portfolio and potentially increase your returns.
